TEXT.source: Li-May Paiwan Data, Participant Sarnix, file 02JE107-3

S.FORM: azua a tjaucikel, na kemasi tjagaraus titjen a mapuljat. sa naseman vurung tua qatjuvian.
izua za matjatjelu a pinakaqapulu a qaqinaljan i padain aya, i paiwan aya, i piyuma aya, sana kemasizua a mavadavaday.
mavana azua pinaka raval aya, vuculj aya, paumaumaq aya, paqaluqalu aya. sa amin itjen a semusususu tua semanvusam a masan mamazangiljan.
na masansimatjelj a tjaljetjaljan a caucau, paru mamazangiljan aya, ma mazangilj aya, mamazangiljan aya, mazangilj aya, rakac aya, qatitan aya.
azua paqulid inika a maqati a papucekelj a mamazangiljan katua qatitan, pinakapa pinakapa pungdan tiamadju.
izua azua masantjelulj a tjaljapazangalan a pinaka a qata aya, “re reteretan reretan aya, dragaman aya” nua mamazangiljan. mavan anga azua sinan sauzayan nua mamazangiljan.
nu mecevuang a tjara mamazangizangiljan nu uri pucekelj, mavan anga azua tjaljapazangalan a sinilisi tua pinaka mamazangiljan.
izua uta masan liaw a palisian, mavan a masan tjaljapazangalan a pakatua “maljeveq” aya. izua pulingaw a kinemenem tua sipalisian.
izua pinaka pulima aya, inika palaing tu uqaljay tu vavayan.
izua uqaljay a kisanvenecik: paru tua cukes aya, langalj aya, tjakit aya, kisanseman reretan aya. izua vavayan a pulima uta: paru kisan cemepu aya, temeqic tua situngan aya.
izua kivecik a vavayavayan ta pitualima; izua kivecik a uqaljaqaljay a pitua kinacavacavan.
babulayan a vinecikan sa taliduan taliduitjen a pacun.
taliduitjen a pacun nu zemiyazian itua pucekecekelj a na mirava,
na temarar sana puk sana pukavaluan a vavayavayan, na tjemalupung a rakac a uqaljayqaljay tua katjepalaljan nua qadris.
valeljeveljan a vavayavayan, sauqaljaqaljay a sasauqaljayan angata uqaljaqaljay nua sePaiwan!
